TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi RegistryProxy extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供了用于操控注册表的属性和方法。

span.span: Provides properties and methods for manipulating the registry.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要使用这些属性，必须拥有 枚举的读取和写入权限。To use these properties, you must have Read and Write permission from the enumeration. 任何以完全信任级别运行的代码（在默认安全策略下，这是安装在用户的本地硬盘上的任何代码）都具有访问注册表所需的权限。Any code running with full trust (under the default security policy, this is any code installed on the user's local hard drive) has the necessary permissions to access the registry. 有关详细信息，请参阅 类。For more information, see the class. 下表列出了涉及 `My.Computer.Registry` 对象的任务示例。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Computer.Registry` object. |至To|请参阅See| |--------|---------| |创建注册表项并设置其值Create a registry key and set its value|[如何：创建注册表项并设置其值How to: Create a Registry Key and Set Its Value](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-create-a-registry-key-and-set-its-value.md)| |删除注册表项Delete a registry key|[如何：删除注册表项How to: Delete a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-delete-a-registry-key.md)| |从注册表读取数据Read data from the registry|[如何：从注册表项读取值How to: Read a Value from a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-read-a-value-from-a-registry-key.md)| ## Examples 此示例读取 `HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\MyApp` `Name` 的值，并将其显示在消息框中。This example reads the value `Name` from `HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\MyApp` and displays it in a message box. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyRegistry#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyRegistry/VB/Class1.vb#8)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT` 主要用于存储有关 Windows 中的文件关联的信息。`HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT` is primarily used to store information about file associations in Windows. 命名空间中的 类控制对注册表变量的访问。The class, which is in the namespace, controls access to registry variables. 不应将注册表变量存储在某些内存位置，在这些位置，不具有 的代码可访问这些变量。Registry variables should not be stored in memory locations where code without can access them. 同样，在授予权限时，只授予完成工作所需的那些权限。Similarly, when granting permissions, grant only those privileges necessary to get the job done. 通过 枚举定义注册表权限访问值。Registry permission access values are defined by the enumeration. 下表详细说明了其成员。The following table details its members. |值Value|说明Description| |-----------|-----------------| |AllAccessAllAccess|对注册表变量进行创建、读取和写入访问。Create, read, and write access to registry variables.| |创建Create|可以创建注册表变量。Create access to registry variables.| |NoAccessNoAccess|没有对注册表变量的访问权限。No access to registry variables.| |读Read|可以读注册表变量。Read access to registry variables.| |写入Write|可以写注册表变量。Write access to registry variables.| 下表列出了涉及 `My.Computer.Registry` 对象的任务示例。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Computer.Registry` object. |至To|请参阅See| |--------|---------| |创建注册表项并设置其值Create a registry key and set its value|[如何：创建注册表项并设置其值How to: Create a Registry Key and Set Its Value](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-create-a-registry-key-and-set-its-value.md)| |删除注册表项Delete a registry key|[如何：删除注册表项How to: Delete a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-delete-a-registry-key.md)| |从注册表项中读取值Read a value from a registry key|[如何：从注册表项读取值How to: Read a Value from a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-read-a-value-from-a-registry-key.md)| ## Examples 此示例获取 `ClassesRoot` 注册表项的子项名称，并将它们添加到 `ListBox1`中。This example gets the names of the subkeys for the `ClassesRoot` registry key and adds them to `ListBox1`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyRegistry#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyRegistry/VB/Class1.vb#10)] 此示例要求在项目中有一个名为 `ListBox1` 的 `ListBox`。This example requires that you have a `ListBox` named `ListBox1` in your project.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `HKEY_CURRENT_CONFIG` 主要用于存储计算机上设备的设置。`HKEY_CURRENT_CONFIG` is primarily used to store settings for devices on the computer. 命名空间中的 类控制对注册表变量的访问。The class, which is in the namespace, controls access to registry variables. 不应将注册表变量存储在某些内存位置，在这些位置，不具有 的代码可访问这些变量。Registry variables should not be stored in memory locations where code without can access them. 同样，在授予权限时，只授予完成工作所需的那些权限。Similarly, when granting permissions, grant only those privileges necessary to get the job done. 通过 枚举定义注册表权限访问值。Registry permission access values are defined by the enumeration. 下表详细说明了其成员。The following table details its members. |值Value|说明Description| |-----------|-----------------| |AllAccessAllAccess|对注册表变量进行创建、读取和写入访问。Create, read, and write access to registry variables.| |创建Create|可以创建注册表变量。Create access to registry variables.| |NoAccessNoAccess|没有对注册表变量的访问权限。No access to registry variables.| |读Read|可以读注册表变量。Read access to registry variables.| |写入Write|可以写注册表变量。Write access to registry variables.| 下表列出了涉及 `My.Computer.Registry` 对象的任务示例。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Computer.Registry` object. |至To|请参阅See| |--------|---------| |创建注册表项并设置其值Create a registry key and set its value|[如何：创建注册表项并设置其值How to: Create a Registry Key and Set Its Value](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-create-a-registry-key-and-set-its-value.md)| |删除注册表项Delete a registry key|[如何：删除注册表项How to: Delete a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-delete-a-registry-key.md)| |从注册表项中读取值Read a value from a registry key|[如何：从注册表项读取值How to: Read a Value from a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-read-a-value-from-a-registry-key.md)| ## Examples 此示例创建 `MyDeviceSettings`的子项。This example creates the subkey `MyDeviceSettings`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyRegistry#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyRegistry/VB/Class1.vb#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `HKEY_CURRENT_USER` 主要用于在 Windows 中存储每用户设置（如颜色和字体）。`HKEY_CURRENT_USER` is primarily used to store per-user settings, such as colors and fonts, in Windows. 密钥因用户而异。The key differ according to the user. 命名空间中的 类控制对注册表变量的访问。The class, which is in the namespace, controls access to registry variables. 不应将注册表变量存储在某些内存位置，在这些位置，不具有 的代码可访问这些变量。Registry variables should not be stored in memory locations where code without can access them. 同样，在授予权限时，请授予完成工作所需的最少权限。Similarly, when granting permissions, grant the fewest privileges necessary to get the job done. 通过 枚举定义注册表权限访问值。Registry permission access values are defined by the enumeration. 下表详细说明了其成员。The following table details its members. |值Value|说明Description| |-----------|-----------------| |AllAccessAllAccess|对注册表变量进行创建、读取和写入访问。Create, read, and write access to registry variables.| |创建Create|可以创建注册表变量。Create access to registry variables.| |NoAccessNoAccess|没有对注册表变量的访问权限。No access to registry variables.| |读Read|可以读注册表变量。Read access to registry variables.| |写入Write|可以写注册表变量。Write access to registry variables.| 下表列出了涉及 `My.Computer.Registry` 对象的任务示例。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Computer.Registry` object. |至To|请参阅See| |--------|---------| |创建注册表项并设置其值Create a registry key and set its value|[如何：创建注册表项并设置其值How to: Create a Registry Key and Set Its Value](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-create-a-registry-key-and-set-its-value.md)| |删除注册表项Delete a registry key|[如何：删除注册表项How to: Delete a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-delete-a-registry-key.md)| |从注册表项中读取值Read a value from a registry key|[如何：从注册表项读取值How to: Read a Value from a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-read-a-value-from-a-registry-key.md)| ## Examples 此示例将删除子项 `Software\MyCompany\Preferences\UserData`。This example deletes the subkey `Software\MyCompany\Preferences\UserData`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyRegistry#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyRegistry/VB/Class1.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `HKEY_DYNDATA` 用于存储动态注册表数据，如虚拟设备驱动程序使用的数据，并且仅在 Windows 95/98 系统上受支持。`HKEY_DYNDATA` is used to store dynamic registry data, such as that used by Virtual Device Drivers and is supported only on Windows 95/98 systems. 在非 Windows 95/98 系统上，调用 `Registry.DynData`返回的密钥的任何方法（如 `CreateSubKey`、`DeleteSubKey`、`GetSubKeyCount`、`GetValueCount`等）都将引发 。On non-Windows 95/98 systems, calling any methods of the key returned by `Registry.DynData`, such as `CreateSubKey`, `DeleteSubKey`, `GetSubKeyCount`, `GetValueCount`, etc., will throw a . 命名空间中的 类控制对注册表变量的访问。The class, which is in the namespace, controls access to registry variables. 不应将注册表变量存储在某些内存位置，在这些位置，不具有 的代码可访问这些变量。Registry variables should not be stored in memory locations where code without can access them. 同样，在授予权限时，请授予完成工作所需的最少权限。Similarly, when granting permissions, grant the fewest privileges necessary to get the job done. 通过 枚举定义注册表权限访问值。Registry permission access values are defined by the enumeration. 下表详细说明了其成员。The following table details its members. |值Value|说明Description| |-----------|-----------------| |AllAccessAllAccess|对注册表变量进行创建、读取和写入访问。Create, read, and write access to registry variables.| |创建Create|可以创建注册表变量。Create access to registry variables.| |NoAccessNoAccess|没有对注册表变量的访问权限。No access to registry variables.| |读Read|可以读注册表变量。Read access to registry variables.| |写入Write|可以写注册表变量。Write access to registry variables.| 下表列出了涉及 `My.Computer.Registry` 对象的任务示例。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Computer.Registry` object. |至To|请参阅See| |--------|---------| |创建注册表项并设置其值Create a registry key and set its value|[如何：创建注册表项并设置其值How to: Create a Registry Key and Set Its Value](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-create-a-registry-key-and-set-its-value.md)| |删除注册表项Delete a registry key|[如何：删除注册表项How to: Delete a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-delete-a-registry-key.md)| |从注册表项中读取值Read a value from a registry key|[如何：从注册表项读取值How to: Read a Value from a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-read-a-value-from-a-registry-key.md)| ## Examples 此示例将删除子项树 `Software\MyCompany\Preferences`。This example deletes the subkey tree `Software\MyCompany\Preferences`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyRegistry#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyRegistry/VB/Class1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public object GetValue (string keyName, string valueName, object defaultValue);
.method public instance object GetValue(string keyName, string valueName, object defaultValue) cil managed
Public Function GetValue (keyName As String, valueName As String, defaultValue As Object) As Object
public: System::Object ^ GetValue(System::String ^ keyName, System::String ^ valueName, System::Object ^ defaultValue);
member this.GetValue : string * string * obj -> obj

span.span: Key from which the value is to be retrieved.
Required.
Value to be retrieved.
Required.

param.name: defaultValue
param.span: 当值不存在时要提供的默认值。

span.span: Default value to be supplied if the value does not exist.
Required.
Gets a value from a registry key.
Gets a value from a registry key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `valueName` 不区分大小写。`valueName` is not case-sensitive. 注册表项可以包含一个不与任何名称关联的值。A registry key can contain one value that is not associated with any name. 在注册表编辑器中显示此未命名值时，将显示字符串 "（默认值）"，而不是名称。When this unnamed value is displayed in the registry editor, the string "(Default)" appears instead of a name. 若要检索此未命名值，请为 `valueName`指定 null 或空字符串（""）。To retrieve this unnamed value, specify either null or the empty string ("") for `valueName`. 下表列出了涉及 `GetValue` 方法的任务示例。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `GetValue` method. |至To|请参阅See| |--------|---------| |从注册表项中读取值Read a value from a registry key|[如何：从注册表项读取值How to: Read a Value from a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-read-a-value-from-a-registry-key.md)| ## Examples 此示例读取 `HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\MyApp` `Name` 的值，并将其显示在 `MessageBox`中。This example reads the value `Name` from `HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\MyApp` and displays it in a `MessageBox`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyRegistry#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyRegistry/VB/Class1.vb#9)]

exception.span: 该用户没有读取注册表项所需的权限。

span.span: The user does not have the permissions required to read from the registry key.

exception.span: 包含指定值的 已标记为删除。

span.span: The that contains the specified value has been marked for deletion.

exception.span: 未以有效注册表根开头。

span.span: does not begin with a valid registry root.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE` 通常用于存储不同于 Windows 中的用户的设置。`HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE` is usually used to store settings that do not vary from user to user in Windows. 计算机的所有用户共享此密钥。All users of the computer share this key. 它的五个子项（`Hardware`、`SAM`、`Security`、`Software`和 `System`）保存本地计算机的配置数据。Its five subkeys (`Hardware`, `SAM`, `Security`, `Software`, and `System`) hold configuration data for the local machine. 命名空间中的 类控制对注册表变量的访问。The class, which is in the namespace, controls access to registry variables. 不应将注册表变量存储在某些内存位置，在这些位置，不具有 的代码可访问这些变量。Registry variables should not be stored in memory locations where code without can access them. 同样，在授予权限时，请授予完成工作所需的最少权限。Similarly, when granting permissions, grant the fewest privileges necessary to get the job done. 通过 枚举定义注册表权限访问值。Registry permission access values are defined by the enumeration. 下表详细说明了其成员。The following table details its members. |值Value|说明Description| |-----------|-----------------| |AllAccessAllAccess|对注册表变量进行创建、读取和写入访问。Create, read, and write access to registry variables.| |创建Create|可以创建注册表变量。Create access to registry variables.| |NoAccessNoAccess|没有对注册表变量的访问权限。No access to registry variables.| |读Read|可以读注册表变量。Read access to registry variables.| |写入Write|可以写注册表变量。Write access to registry variables.| 下表列出了涉及 `My.Computer.Registry` 对象的任务示例。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Computer.Registry` object. |至To|请参阅See| |--------|---------| |创建注册表项并设置其值Create a registry key and set its value|[如何：创建注册表项并设置其值How to: Create a Registry Key and Set Its Value](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-create-a-registry-key-and-set-its-value.md)| |删除注册表项Delete a registry key|[如何：删除注册表项How to: Delete a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-delete-a-registry-key.md)| |从注册表项中读取值Read a value from a registry key|[如何：从注册表项读取值How to: Read a Value from a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-read-a-value-from-a-registry-key.md)| ## Examples 此示例将打开子项 `Software\MyCompany\Preferences`，并将值 `FontColor` 设置为 `"red"`。This example opens the subkey `Software\MyCompany\Preferences` and sets the value `FontColor` to `"red"`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyRegistry#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyRegistry/VB/Class1.vb#3)]

span.span: Returns a type, which provides access to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `HKEY_PERFORMANCE_DATA` 用于访问软件组件的性能信息。`HKEY_PERFORMANCE_DATA` is used to access performance information for software components. 每个软件组件在安装时创建其对象和计数器的密钥，并在执行时写入计数器数据。Each software component creates keys for its objects and counters when it is installed and writes counter data while it is executing. 尽管此数据用于访问，但不会存储在注册表中。This data is not stored in the registry, although the registry is used to access it. 相反，通过 `HKEY_PERFORMANCE_DATA` 调用注册表函数会导致系统从适当的系统对象管理器收集数据。Instead, calling registry functions via `HKEY_PERFORMANCE_DATA` causes the system to collect the data from the appropriate system object managers. 此密钥不存在于 Windows 98 系统上;除了调用 `Name` 方法以外，尝试使用它将引发 。This key does not exist on Windows 98 systems; an attempt to use it other than calling the `Name` method will throw an . 此密钥通常不能写入;尝试在其上创建子项会引发 。This key cannot normally be written to; attempting to create a subkey on it will throw an . 命名空间中的 类控制对注册表变量的访问。The class, which is in the namespace, controls access to registry variables. 不应将注册表变量存储在某些内存位置，在这些位置，不具有 的代码可访问这些变量。Registry variables should not be stored in memory locations where code without can access them. 同样，在授予权限时，请授予完成工作所需的最少权限。Similarly, when granting permissions, grant the fewest privileges necessary to get the job done. 通过 枚举定义注册表权限访问值。Registry permission access values are defined by the enumeration. 下表详细说明了其成员。The following table details its members. |值Value|说明Description| |-----------|-----------------| |AllAccessAllAccess|对注册表变量进行创建、读取和写入访问。Create, read, and write access to registry variables.| |创建Create|可以创建注册表变量。Create access to registry variables.| |NoAccessNoAccess|没有对注册表变量的访问权限。No access to registry variables.| |读Read|可以读注册表变量。Read access to registry variables.| |写入Write|可以写注册表变量。Write access to registry variables.| 下表列出了涉及 `My.Computer.Registry` 对象的任务示例。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Computer.Registry` object. |至To|请参阅See| |--------|---------| |创建注册表项并设置其值Create a registry key and set its value|[如何：创建注册表项并设置其值How to: Create a Registry Key and Set Its Value](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-create-a-registry-key-and-set-its-value.md)| |删除注册表项Delete a registry key|[如何：删除注册表项How to: Delete a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-delete-a-registry-key.md)| |从注册表项中读取值Read a value from a registry key|[如何：从注册表项读取值How to: Read a Value from a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-read-a-value-from-a-registry-key.md)| ## Examples 此示例从 `MyCompany` 子项获取 `ThisSoftware` 值。This example gets the value `ThisSoftware` from the `MyCompany` subkey. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyRegistry#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyRegistry/VB/Class1.vb#7)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定的键或值不存在，则创建它。If the specified key or value does not exist, it is created. 下面是涉及 `My.Computer.Registry.SetValue` 方法的任务示例。Here is an example of a task involving the `My.Computer.Registry.SetValue` method. |至To|请参阅See| |--------|---------| |在注册表项中设置值Set a value in a registry key|[如何：创建注册表项并设置其值How to: Create a Registry Key and Set Its Value](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-create-a-registry-key-and-set-its-value.md)| ## Examples 此示例将键 `HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\MyCompany\Preferences`中的值 `FontColor` 设置为 "red"。This example sets the value `FontColor` to "red" in the key `HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\MyCompany\Preferences`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyRegistry#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyRegistry/VB/Class1.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `HKEY_USERS` 主要用于存储首次用户的默认设置。`HKEY_USERS` is primarily used to store default settings for first-time users. 命名空间中的 类控制对注册表变量的访问。The class, which is in the namespace, controls access to registry variables. 不应将注册表变量存储在某些内存位置，在这些位置，不具有 的代码可访问这些变量。Registry variables should not be stored in memory locations where code without can access them. 同样，在授予权限时，请授予完成工作所需的最少权限。Similarly, when granting permissions, grant the fewest privileges necessary to get the job done. 通过 枚举定义注册表权限访问值。Registry permission access values are defined by the enumeration. 下表详细说明了其成员。The following table details its members. |值Value|对注册表变量的访问Access to Registry Variables| |-----------|----------------------------------| |AllAccessAllAccess|创建、读取和写入Create, read, and write| |创建Create|创建Create| |NoAccessNoAccess|无访问权限。No access.| |读Read|读Read| |写入Write|写入Write| 下表列出了涉及 `My.Computer.Registry` 对象的任务示例。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Computer.Registry` object. |**若要****To**|**请参阅****See**| |------------|-------------| |创建注册表项并设置其值Create a registry key and set its value|[如何：创建注册表项并设置其值How to: Create a Registry Key and Set Its Value](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-create-a-registry-key-and-set-its-value.md)| |删除注册表项Delete a registry key|[如何：删除注册表项How to: Delete a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-delete-a-registry-key.md)| |从注册表项中读取值Read a value from a registry key|[如何：从注册表项读取值How to: Read a Value from a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-read-a-value-from-a-registry-key.md)| ## Examples 此示例统计并显示注册表项中的值数。This example counts and displays the number of values in the registry key. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyRegistry#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyRegistry/VB/Class1.vb#4)]
